resources.string:
While Panthera, Inc. accepts the donations of Cat Party, Panthera in no way endorses or is affiliated with Cat Party or App Aware Inc. 

The following media were taken from their corresponding sources. Each source in no way endorses or is affiliated with Cat Party or App Aware Inc. 

Music: 
"Cat Party ringtone" from Adult Swim's Frisky Dingo 

Images: 
Black Fur and Orange Fur - www.photos-public-domain.com 
Spotted Fur - Charles Williams at www.wokay.com/author/charles/

Cat Party logo - www.clipartpanda.com
You will lose all saved GIFs.
Cat Party will now update and restart

Cat Party could not have become what it is without the following: gifs from Giphy, purpose from Panthera, design from Lizzy, product advice from Henry, business advice from Beau, legal advice from Julian, code from Shafeeq, more code from the Android Open Source Project, fancy progress spinners from Android Arsenal, coursework from the Yale School of Management and Department of Computer Science, and the support and patience of many friends. Thanks!

App Aware Inc. is a USA, Delaware registered not-for-profit corporation. We partner with other not-for-profit organizations to make apps that raise awareness and money for their cause. Questions, suggestions, or inquiries can be sent to:
Let us know what you think! Thank you for your time.

Cat Party is a not-for-profit app made for entertainment. Net proceeds from in-app donations will go directly to Panthera, the leading conservation group for endangered cat species around the globe. Learn more about Panthera at:
